statements: SELECT * FROM game_data WHERE home_team = 'Team A';
SELECT game_id, home_team, away_team FROM game_data WHERE schedule_date = '2023-01-15';
SELECT schedule_date, home_score, away_score FROM game_data WHERE completed = true;
SELECT * FROM game_data WHERE away_team = 'Team B' ORDER BY schedule_date DESC;
SELECT home_team, SUM(home_score) AS total_home_score FROM game_data GROUP BY home_team HAVING total_home_score > 50;
SELECT * FROM game_data WHERE home_team = 'Lakers' AND completed = TRUE
SELECT game_id, home_team, away_team, schedule_date FROM game_data WHERE home_score > away_score
SELECT home_team, away_team, home_score, away_score FROM game_data WHERE schedule_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT DISTINCT home_team, away_team FROM game_data WHERE completed = FALSE ORDER BY schedule_date DESC
SELECT AVG(home_score) AS avg_home_score, AVG(away_score) AS avg_away_score FROM game_data WHERE home_score > 100
SELECT * FROM Game_Schedule WHERE game_id = 123;
SELECT home_team, away_team, game_date FROM Game_Schedule WHERE game_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_name, goals_scored, assists FROM Player_Stats WHERE player_id = 5;
SELECT player_name, games_played FROM Player_Stats ORDER BY games_played DESC;
SELECT * FROM Game_Schedule WHERE home_team = 'Real Madrid' AND away_team = 'Barcelona';
SELECT * FROM Game_Schedule WHERE home_team = 'Manchester United' AND game_date = '2022-12-25';
SELECT player_name, games_played, goals_scored, assists FROM Player_Stats WHERE assists > 5 ORDER BY goals_scored DESC;
SELECT game_date, home_team, away_team FROM Game_Schedule ORDER BY game_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT player_name, goals_scored/(games_played*1.0) AS goals_per_game FROM Player_Stats WHERE games_played > 10 ORDER BY goals_per_game DESC;
SELECT home_team, COUNT(*) AS total_games_played FROM Game_Schedule GROUP BY home_team HAVING COUNT(*) > 10 ORDER BY total_games_played DESC;
SELECT * FROM game_schedule;
SELECT game_id, game_date, location FROM game_schedule WHERE game_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT home_team, away_team FROM game_schedule WHERE location = 'Stadium A';
SELECT player_name, goals_scored FROM player_statistics ORDER BY goals_scored DESC;
SELECT team_name, SUM(goals_scored) AS total_goals FROM player_statistics GROUP BY team_name;
SELECT * FROM game_schedule ORDER BY game_date DESC, game_time ASC;
SELECT home_team, away_team, game_date, location FROM game_schedule WHERE location='Stadium A' ORDER BY game_date;
SELECT home_team, away_team, winning_team FROM scores WHERE home_team_score > away_team_score;
SELECT player_name, goals_scored, assists FROM player_statistics WHERE team_name='Team A' ORDER BY goals_scored DESC;
SELECT player_name, team_name, games_played FROM player_statistics WHERE games_played > 10 ORDER BY games_played DESC;
SELECT * FROM GameSchedule;
SELECT game_id, game_date, game_time FROM GameSchedule ORDER BY game_date DESC;
SELECT player_name, player_team, player_position FROM PlayerStatistics WHERE player_team='Team A';
SELECT game_id, analysis_result FROM Analysis WHERE analysis_result LIKE '%positive%';
SELECT game_id, MAX(score) AS max_score FROM Scores GROUP BY game_id ORDER BY max_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM GameSchedule ORDER BY game_date DESC, game_time ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT player_id, player_name, player_team FROM PlayerStatistics WHERE player_position = 'Forward';
SELECT game_id, game_date, location FROM GameSchedule WHERE location LIKE 'Arena%' ORDER BY game_date ASC;

SELECT Scores.player_id, PlayerStatistics.player_name, Scores.score FROM Scores INNER JOIN PlayerStatistics ON Scores.player_id = PlayerStatistics.player_id WHERE Scores.score > 50 ORDER BY Scores.score DESC;

SELECT GameSchedule.game_id, GameSchedule.game_date, Analysis.analysis_result FROM GameSchedule LEFT JOIN Analysis ON GameSchedule.game_id = Analysis.game_id WHERE Analysis.analysis_result IS NOT NULL ORDER BY GameSchedule.game_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM game_schedules;
SELECT game_id, game_date, location FROM game_schedules ORDER BY game_date DESC;
SELECT home_team, away_team, game_date FROM game_schedules WHERE game_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY game_date;
SELECT team_name, city FROM teams WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT player_name, position, age FROM players WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM game_schedules ORDER BY game_date DESC;
SELECT location, home_team, away_team FROM game_schedules WHERE game_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT team, SUM(score) as total_score FROM scores GROUP BY team HAVING total_score > 100;
SELECT player_name, points, rebounds, assists FROM player_statistics WHERE game_id = 1001 AND points > 20;
SELECT team_name, city, coach, COUNT(player_id) as total_players FROM teams JOIN players ON teams.team_id = players.team_id GROUP BY team_name ORDER BY total_players DESC;
